name: Desanime
description:
My first attempt at creating a textual inversion that can be applied to anime to produce Indian looking female characters.

Note: Since this is trained on real persons' photos, putting this TI at the beginning of the prompt generates absolutely terrible looking faces. Use it in the middle/ end of the prompt and play with the strength.

Recommended setting:

  1. Strength: 0.3-0.8

  2. Sampler: DPM++ 2M SDE Karras

  3. Steps: 20-30

  4. CFG: 7-9

Comments and suggestions welcome.

PS: Do realize this is a .pt file, but I'm unable to convert those into .safetensors. Any recommendations on how are welcome.

meta.prompt: foreshortening,  (masterpiece:1.2),  (best quality:1.2), (extremely detailed:1.2),  looking at camera,  (ultra detailed), 8k, 1girl, slim and petite body, long dress, curls, necklace, standing,  at a cocktail party, DESANIME:0.5
meta.negativePrompt: ((Child, childish)), (bad hands:1.2), (worst quality:1.2), ((NSFW)), (bad quality:1.2), ((pale skin)), bad-artist-anime, bad-artist, EasyNegative, bright light, loli, extra legs, extra army, bad anatomy, missing legs, missing arms, (extra toes:1.2), big butt, big ass
